title: CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS - USD ($)shares in Thousands, $ in Millions

null.label: Net revenue
null.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

null.label: Cost of goods sold
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

null.label: Gross profit
null.definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Operating expenses:.label: Customer service and merchant fees
Operating expenses:.definition: Represents information pertaining to expenses related to customer service and merchant fees incurred during the period.

Operating expenses:.label: Advertising
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount charged to advertising expense for the period, which are expenses incurred with the objective of increasing revenue for a specified brand, product or product line.

Operating expenses:.label: Selling, operations, technology, general and administrative
Operating expenses:.definition: The aggregate total of expenses of technology, operations and managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

Operating expenses:.label: Impairment and other related net charges
Operating expenses:.definition: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

Operating expenses:.label: Restructuring charges
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

Operating expenses:.label: Total operating expenses
Operating expenses:.definition: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Operating expenses:.label: Loss from operations
Operating expenses:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Operating expenses:.label: Interest expense, net
Operating expenses:.definition: The net amount of nonoperating interest income (expense).

Operating expenses:.label: Other income (expense), net
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Operating expenses:.label: Gain on debt extinguishment
Operating expenses:.definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Operating expenses:.label: Loss before income taxes
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Operating expenses:.label: Provision for income taxes, net
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Operating expenses:.label: Net loss
Operating expenses:.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Loss per share:.label: Basic (in dollars per share)
Loss per share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Loss per share:.label: Diluted (in dollars per shares)
Loss per share:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Weighted-average number of shares of com.label: Basic (in shares)
Weighted-average number of shares of com.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

Weighted-average number of shares of com.label: Diluted (in shares)
Weighted-average number of shares of com.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
